uhh_lt.GermEval2017.baseline.uimahelper

Class Preprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uhh_lt.GermEval2017.baseline.uimahelper.Preprocessor

  • public class Preprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Preprocessor class that performs NLP operations using UIMA AnalysisEngines.
